name: zsh-system-completions
description: A package that brings stock Zsh completions under the control of ZI
author: Sebastian Gniazdowski

default.atclone: print Installing system completions...; mkdir -p $ZPFX/funs; command cp -f $ZPFX/share/zsh/$ZSH_VERSION/functions/^_* $ZPFX/funs; zi creinstall -q $ZPFX/share/zsh/$ZSH_VERSION/functions;
